name: Erica Pruitt
text: Only reason it's not 5 stars is because the tables weren't wiped down. Came in with 2 small children and the staff was super friendly, along with the patrons. Cool options & everything was delicious. The new high rise thick crust is really good. Unlimited toppings for like $8.

name: Checkered Flag Interactive Media
text: Loved Pieology! Join their store club for exclusive offers and a free pizza on your birthday! You can put unlimited toppings on your pizzas made to order and they also have specialty pizzas and can accomodate for diet restrictions. Perfect for campus.

name: Jerry Shi
text: friendly staff, solid price, customizable toppings. at $8.43 for a good size personal pizza with unlimited toppings, i can't think of a better taste/value combo around.

name: Taylor Elder
text: Great service and amazing make-your-own pizza! They allow you to have multiple sauces and unlimited toppings.

name: Jessica P. Hernandez
text: Many toppings to choose from. I love that there was a whole wheat option for the crust. Friendly staff and delicious pizza!

name: Valerie Shinabarger
text: Some of the best customer service in town! I've been coming here for years and have always had inexpensive and amazing pizza(you choose what's on it so if it's bad that's on you haha) and fun and memorable interactions with employees. It's …More

name: Ricardo Paiva
text: An amazing idea. Why I didn't think on it before.

name: Nolan Orr
text: Great thin crust pizza! I went for pi day

name: Anicia Mirchandani
text: Recently tried pieology despite 6+ years living in Ann Arbor and quickly started going on a weekly basis. Sad to see this go after discovering it so recently. Amazing pizza and great staff!

name: Anupama Sharma
text: I love this place because you can customize your pizza so you can have a very healthy pizza. Also, lots of veggie options for toppings, as I am a vegetarian it's very important for me because I can be as creative as I want. Best part is their veggies are very fresh.

name: Arielle Sokol
text: I only came here once but I really enjoyed the pizza at Pieology and that is saying a lot since I grew up in New York.  As someone with food allergies and restrictions, I appreciated the ability to customize your own pizza.  The staff is …More

name: Shelby Boers
text: Well I used to like this place. In fact I previously gave them a four star review. However, I went to pieology today (10/2/28 7pm) and was highly disappointed. None of the employees seemed to know what they were doing and the whole place …More

name: James Rhodes
text: I loved this shop. I went to go in yesterday and saw the sign on the door that said they had closed permenatly. I wish they would open back up. The staff was super friendly and helpful no matter what the question was. They made ordering fun …More

name: Kathy Nixon
text: Pizza was very tasty! My tastebuds are jumping. Drove over from Jackson.  It was worth the drive. The price was right and service was great.  We will be back. :)

name: Laurie Kitchen
text: Yum! Design your own! Fresh...like Subway. Love it! Fun a d Friendly staff! Can't beat the price either!

name: Evan Gonzales
text: My man, Alfredo, makes the BEST pizzas around. He gives me the good good recommendations on what to top my pizza with - always a delicious, fully loaded pizza for a low price considering how much meat and veggies I get on each pizza. Highly recommend if you're in the mood to eat a whole pizza in one sitting.

name: Diane Bingham
text: Amazing pie! Warm cookies, and very good service. If you love good pizza with fast service this is your place when in Ann Arbor Michigan.

name: Nautical Miles
text: I finally found the closest I can find, so far, of the perfect fusion of Neapolitan Italian and Americanized pizza. The the, crisp crust is delectable, while the toppings and sauce are plentiful to satisfy a hungry man. This is my pizza!

name: Emily Combs
text: It was delicious!  My husband and I split the thicker crust pizza, and both of us had plenty.  Highly recommend the Alfredo pizza with butter and pepperoni!!!

name: Romeo Klobucar
text: Great place! All the staff were so friendly and conversational and the food was fantastic. Quick, kind service, and fresh ingredients.

name: Anthony Bingert Jr
text: This place is pretty awesome. For a decent price (I want to say around 8 or 9 dollars) you can create your own 11.5 inch pizza. You can choose everything from the type of dough, sauce, as well as an unlimited amount of toppings of your …More

name: Charles Lohr
text: Variable quality.  I don't expect to return soon.  The last visit was terrible and the first three visits were good.  On the last visit I requested a well-done thin pizza.  The bottom was well-done and the top was barely cooked.  Might be an oven problem.  What a disappointment as this had been a good pizza place.

name: Max Martin
text: Their Pizza is great value for money.  Their food and service are great. I highly recommend.

name: Ted Austin
text: Great build your own pizza with lots of toppings choices.  I recommend the double thick crust

name: Henry Zhou
text: I ate a pizza here a few days ago, and I really enjoyed it. The employees seemed enthusiastic about their jobs, and made the pizza very well. I would recommend this to anyone in the area

name: Sam S
text: I had some business in AA, thought I'd walk around Downtown afterwards and spotted this place. Excellent pizza. -1 for the partially burnt crust. I wish they had this when I was at UM. Good stuff!

name: Nathan Timperley
text: Absolutely terrible.  Ordered online for lunch.  Waited a bit and went in to pick up.  Was told it would just be 2 minutes.  Waited more than 20 and asked what the deal was.  Then they found my pizza exactly where it was sitting in the …More

name: Amit Gungune
text: Love the concept, love the Pizzas and love the pricing. Just one tiny little thing, folks serving the Pizza need to be more customer friendly here in Ann Arbor, smile more, be nicer, don't differentiate between customers. Anyways, could …More

name: Adham El-Batal
text: Great place with great pizza. Reasonable priced pies with unlimited toppings. If you want to get creative what your toppings and try cool things without breaking the bank, this is the place to go!

name: Pop Nadoes
text: Pretty good tasting if you like thin crust pizza, but kinda pricey for how small it is (~11 inch). Definitely the wrong choice if you aren't getting at least 4+ toppings. Back when they used Hooked I went there pretty often with friends, …More

name: Anonymous Person
text: Great thin crust style pizza made to order and similar to how subway make subs. You pick the type and then add what you want in addition as you watch them make it. They also offer online ordering. Food is priced fairly considering where you are and that it's more on the gourmet side. Enjoy!!

name: Connivery Dives
text: I like the customization of this place! They are pretty generous with toppings, and a personal pizza usually leaves me with leftovers for the next day's lunch. It's a good place to go if you want your za exactly the way you like it.

name: Nick Strong
text: I dunno if it's the guy's authentic accent or what, but my wife and I stopped in here for lunch on our anniversary and we really liked it!  The two of us each had nice sized pies for under 20$ and we got to each have our own flavors we were craving.  Would go again!

name: Ed Hennessey
text: Great idea for a pizza chain!  Subway - but for Pizza without all the added money for extras.  The pizza is the same price no matter how many toppings.  I got a mix of Mozzarella  and Feta cheese with pepperoni and bacon with the alfredo sauce.  Quick service too.  The pepperoni tasted great to me unlike the other person's review.

name: Madhura Gandhi
text: It's a good place to satisfy your pizza cravings at a cheap price. They are generous with toppings. My personal favourite is the house red tomato sauce with pesto!

name: Parth Shah
text: Nice staff good pizza. Actually great Pizza. Great afterbake sauces.

name: Karen Gordon
text: The pizza was delicious, but the manager was horrendous. We ordered the Smokin' Buffalo Chicken for my son and received a completely different pizza instead. We brought it up and asked to get it changed to what we ordered, but the manager …More

name: MAK
text: Walked in with the intention to taste test this new place and before I knew it we were in line for seconds! The pies are great. Just the right portion size(you can order half a pie as well) unlimited toppings, fresh & piping hot. What else could you ask for?

name: Ajaay Shinde
text: Great pizza. Completely customizable and presented at a fair price. No complaints!

name: Joe Mitchell
text: I like the pizza. And the staff are nice. And the toppings. Good.

name: Alan Beltran
text: One of the best deals around for some tasty pizza. Also, customer service is excellent: employees are very nice!

name: Mason Herr
text: Great affordable food and an extremely friendly staff!!!  Ant keep their food on the l8ne at proper temp check the county heath dept. Reports eat a salad at your own risk

name: Shalena Griffith
text: This pizza place is GREAT...F A N T A S T I C. First off I don't get many meats on my pizza because it is usually fatty low quality stuff so I limit it. HERE, I got THREE meats so good. The cheese is great and I love the idea of a thin …More

name: Caroline Plotner
text: This place is awesome. It has great pizza for a great price (You can buy a pizza with unlimited toppings for 7.95 that feeds 2 people) and for pizza it's actually pretty healthy.

name: THELUSASO
text: Pizza was great, and at a great price! Vegan options too! 👌

name: Keith Mason
text: it was absolutely amazing and downtown ann arbor was happening. I enjoyed my visit and would love to go again sometime in the future.

name: Dasha Kash
text: This place is super great for the price. It's a custom pizza place where you make your own pizza. The concept reminds me of chipotle (a make your own burrito place). The vibe is very chill, it's not a fancy sit down restaurant but it's also …More

name: Jeff Dayton
text: Great pizza, friendly atmosphere, good prices a good place for students to hang out

name: Caryn Woodward
text: Yummy pizza, just the way you want it....lots of choices!

name: Adrian R
text: No problems with customer service, but I didn't really enjoy the pizza.  The thin-crust is more like cracker crust -- it is not chewy at all, just crunchy because it is so thin.  It's like eating a toasted pita topped with pizza toppings -- …More

name: Tonhi Shi
text: The place is ok...I say 77%on cleanliness...there are crud’s n crumbs on the window n sills.  The carne classic was a bit too much cheese   Overall...this is an average joint but with the bar ...I gave it a 4stars.

name: Ethan Klobucar
text: My usual go to for pizza around the Ann Arbor area. Pretty cheap, fast, and a lot of different options you can choose from! Always well kept and clean, never have had a problem there that wasn't quickly accommodated. My favorite is the Butchers Choice!

name: Carl Holzhauer
text: Better now that they have a larger choice of crusts

name: Kristen Olsen
text: I am not usually a thin crust kind of girl. But the crust here is amazing. They have a great variety of toppings. If you can't make up your mind they have choices on the menu that are "pre made" for you. You have a choice of three crises …More

name: Rita Ionides
text: Great pizza and excellent service! Definitely worth coming again.

name: James Wilkinson
text: It was an hour from me walking in the door to walking out the door with my pizza. In comparison to a similar restaurant MOD Pizza, this is much longer. …More

name: Ashley Schnaar
text: Incredible customer service. Delicious pizza and salad.

name: Matthew Walker
text: For the price, this is the best place you could eat. Fast, fresh, and filling. Make it yourself, you won't regret it.

name: Michelle Newhook
text: When you design your own pizza how could it be a bad experience? Friendly staff, and a very big variety of pizza toppings. They also have a few of their own creations you can choose from on the menu.

name: Andrew McCabe
text: Great pizza and a cool vibe.  Staff members wouldn't leave us alone while we tried to eat despite our obvious attempts to be dismissive - pretty creepy waiter

name: Corey Zimmerman
text: I ordered online for pickup, but when I went to pick it up, I was told their system was down and they didn't receive any orders. The guy working was not nice in informing me they had no telephone or internet service. He also told me they …More

name: Andrew Mancuso
text: Alot like Blaze Pizza and generous with the toppings. Not an amazing pizza, but it's quick and relatively cheap.

name: Jackie Knez
text: Awesome fresh made pizza and very good service.

name: Victor Montoya
text: Really, great pizzeria. Any topics you want! On a decent seize personal pizza. Love it. Recommend it.

name: Zack Maaieh
text: One of the coolest places to get pizza. You customize it like chipotle or subway. The pizza always tastes great!

name: John Finch
text: 10/2/18, 7PM : they burnt my pizza and then left it sitting on their counter for 20 minutes before giving it to me. Burnt and room temperature, my two favorite pizza qualities!

name: Kole Swartz
text: Literally the worst customer service.  Employees are consistantly rude and food is never ready when it's supposed to be.  When this was brought to their attention the response was, "Maybe you shouldn't order online," rather than any sort of …More

name: Luna Marquez Ferolla
text: Best pizza!

name: Robert Wilson
text: Excellent service.  Great food and a great value.  Well worth it!

name: Rishi Prasad
text: Very reasonableness priced pizzas that are also very well made!

name: Gil
text: Nice place for warm and cheap food

name: Robert Montgomery
text: Unique pizza with a very friendly staff.  The whole family loved the individual pizzas.

name: Tonya W
text: Love to come here.  Very knowledgeable about gluten allergies, very accomodating.  Never been ill after eating here.

name: Lila Asante-Appiah
text: The pizza was delicious!  Enjoyed the made to order options.  Service was also excellent!

name: Erik B
text: Great pizza at a better price than most other places. The vegan options are superb, but potential for cross contamination is high. Observed cheese in the sauce container

name: Mark Attilio
text: The only thing that is better than their pizza is their staff, and trust me when I say that the quality if that pizza is hard to top ^_:

name: Dante Mason'
text: They have a unique way they cook the pizza if you ever get a change to watch them.

name: Daniel Asher
text: Cheap, mediocre pizza, staff barely listens and they all look like they dread the next customer. Dough is thin and flavorless, toppings are flavorless. Staff constantly trash talk local pizza competitors who's pizza is far superior. …More

name: Vanessa Rodriguez
text: Everything was really good and nice customer service.

name: Sam Suda
text: Coolest way to make pizza ever. As many toppings as you want! Delicious and not too expensive.

name: Anthony Oliver
text: Someone recommended this place to me. I really liked the concept.  Shared a pepperoni pizza,  bbq chicken pizza, and house salad with someone. The bbq chicken pizza wasn't bad but the pepperoni was less than satisfactory. The sauce was …More

name: Stevee Altenbernt
text: They have gluten free pizza and they are very friendly and careful

name: Robert Shank
text: I drove 30 miles to come back here.    The menu is alarmingly simple.  No up charges for fancy toppings.   Just whatever you want however you want it

name: Ken Fox
text: a decent pizza with great topping selection made very quickly

name: Sajay Srivastava
text: Great service, super friendly, tons of options from crust to cheese to toppings to drinks, ready fairly quick and tasted great.

name: Alex Backus
text: Great pizza for a great price

name: Stephanie Roosa
text: Pizza was average... Kind of undercooked. The service is what really deserves 1 star. We got up to the beginning of the line and it seemed like there were a bunch of employees just standing around. The one employee that was ready to take …More

name: Daniel Vech
text: The staff is always super friendly and the pizzas are delicious. Considering how many people are there usually, it is a bit underrated place.

name: Ayman Karem
text: Friendly environment,  with nice people, you can edit your pie

name: Devin Mcgarry
text: I come here all the time for lunch, great pizza , love the cheese bread and they are quick. If there is ever kinda of an issue with the order they will make it right.

name: Karina Johnson
text: Amazing place, and pretty quick too.  Had a pepperoni, ham, and bacon pizza with the garlic herb butter on the crust and it was amazing.

name: Eleanor Nelson
text: Got the vegan cheese and it tasted like real cheese! Very friendly and our food was so good.

name: Sierra S
text: Just an okay chain. I probably won't be back again. All of the veggies and meat taste and look like they came pre chopped and pre packaged. After a $10 little salad and a couple thin crust slices of pizza, I left still hungry.

name: Miles DeNudt
text: This isn't a pizza place for someone who only wants a pepperoni pizza. But those who want to experiment with different cheeses, meats, and toppings will love this restaurant.

name: Gary O'Brien
text: Really friendly staff and great pizza.

name: Nathan Woznick
text: Good price, any topping, good stuff

name: Anthony Bingert
text: Good pizza, hot and fresh. Reasonable price, friendly staff.

name: Marisol Seys
text: Nice place for a quick bite. Friendly service.

name: Patrick Goughler
text: This was some crazy good pizza, reasonable price. Would absolutely recommend to a friend or perhaps random strangers on the internet.

name: Shruti Paranjape
text: Good, fresh, customizable thin crust personal pizza. Ducked a star only because it's not always the most pleasant place to sit.

name: WQ South Duty
text: Great pizza, great service, unlimited toppings, can choose to be healthy with it!

name: Dan Williams
text: Nothing special.  It's California Pizza Kitchen with a new look and name.  The pizza was good, but not special.

name: Brent Helton
text: Absolutely nothing special. Way overpriced unless get ALOT of toppings. Even then the taste leaves something to be desired. Very clean and friendly otherwise!

name: Mark Bielaska
text: Fantastic individual pizza with seemingly infinite choices.

name: Rex Mercer
text: I was really surprised how good this place was they make great thin crust pizza.

name: Amber P

text: Unlimited toppings is nice, but pretty thin pizzas for $7

name: Andrew Davis

name: Navya Murthy
text: Thin crust! Awesome toppings! Tastes great!

name: Scott Louzon
text: Create your own pizza with truly tasty ingredients at a very fair price.

name: Aaron B
text: It's like Subway for pizza, but the ingredients are better and the pizza is always delicious. As many toppings as you want for a flat price.

name: Nancy Moureau
text: Total yum, crunchy, fresh AND customized. The staff was sooo friendly I learned names!

name: Jhuess Villanueva Rodriguez
text: The best place!!! I love this pizza

name: Ivana Chen
text: Huge bang for your buck and the unlimited toppings are awesome. I always eat half and have half saved for another day so it's worth 2 meals!

text: Pizza's (Smokn' Buffalo Chicken Pizza) flavors was good  but was blackened and charred on the bottom. Very crusty and brittle. Not sure if I will return. Moderate price, quick and fast service.

text: Amazing staff and great pizza! 🍕
